question: A friend from another country is moving to your city for work. He / she has asked you for advice about living in your city.Write a letter to your friend. In your letter•	suggest an interesting part of the city to live in•	describe the public transport in your city•	say how your friend can meet new people there
text: I am  glad to hear you after a while.I believe you will have a wonderful time in my city.

As you know,Kerala is a beautiful place with a lot to explore.Cochin is considered to be a wonderful choice since you can experience the best amenities along with sightseeing.Moreover,since you are a great fan of seafood,there is a wonderful aqua tourism village named"Malappuram" where you will have  quality time.The best transport method in Cochin is Metro rail as the traffic in the city tends to be heavy.If you have time, you can try boating in Marine drive.Please find some dates to visit my apartment as well  .Furthermore,We can visit Lulu mall also which is considered to be one of the best malls in the city.
Since you are interested in badminton,you can join Rajiv Gandhi Indoor academy in Kadavanthra.Even though the place is a bit expensive,you can meet people with similar interests over there.
I believe the information is helpful and I am looking forward to meeting you very soon.
